properties.name: aruba.oauth2.client-id
properties.description: OAuth2 client ID for the Aruba PEC API. Sourced from the ARUBA_OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID environment variable.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.client-secret
properties.description: OAuth2 client secret for the Aruba PEC API. Sourced from the ARUBA_OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET environment variable.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.authorization-uri
properties.description: Authorization endpoint URI for the Aruba OAuth2 provider.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.token-uri
properties.description: Token endpoint URI for the Aruba OAuth2 provider.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.redirect-uri
properties.description: Redirect URI registered with the Aruba OAuth2 provider. Sourced from the ARUBA_OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI environment variable.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.scope
properties.description: Space-separated list of OAuth2 scopes requested from the Aruba PEC API.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.api-base-url
properties.description: Base URL for the Aruba PEC REST API.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.connect-timeout-ms
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds for HTTP requests to the Aruba PEC API.

properties.name: aruba.oauth2.read-timeout-ms
properties.description: Read timeout in milliseconds for HTTP requests to the Aruba PEC API.
